revised_title: Molar Teeth Development and Homologies in Wart-Hogs
tldr: The author examines the development and homologies of the molar teeth in Wart-Hogs, determining the succession and structure of their teeth. They discovered that Wart-Hogs have a unique tooth development process, with some teeth being replaced by premolars, and the first true molar showing precocious growth. This research provides insight into the dentition of Wart-Hogs and contributes to the understanding of mammalian tooth development.
